00114 class AGENTPP_DECL MibComplexEntry: public MibEntry {
00115 friend class Mib;
00116 public:
00126         MibComplexEntry(const Oidx&, mib_access);
00127 
00134         MibComplexEntry(const MibComplexEntry&);
00135 
00139         virtual ~MibComplexEntry();
00140 
00141 
00150         virtual mib_type        type() const { return AGENTPP_COMPLEX; }
00151 
00158         virtual MibEntry*       clone() = 0;
00159 
00173         virtual Oidx            find_succ(const Oidx&, Request* req = 0) = 0;
00174 
00175         // interfaces dispatch table <-> management instrumentation
00176         
00183         virtual void            get_request(Request*, int) = 0;
00184 
00191         virtual void            get_next_request(Request*, int) = 0;
00192         
00201         virtual int             commit_set_request(Request*, int) 
00202                                   { return SNMP_ERROR_COMITFAIL; }
00203 
00213         virtual int             prepare_set_request(Request*, int&) 
00214                                   { return SNMP_ERROR_NOT_WRITEABLE; }
00215 
00224         virtual int             undo_set_request(Request*, int&) 
00225                                   { return SNMP_ERROR_SUCCESS; }
00226 
00233         virtual void            cleanup_set_request(Request*, int&) { }
00234 
00242         virtual boolean         serialize(char*&, int&) { return FALSE; }
00243 
00255         virtual boolean         deserialize(char*, int&) { return FALSE; }
00256 
00263         virtual boolean         is_empty() { return FALSE; }
00264 
00265 
00266         // communication between mib objects
00267 
00276         virtual OidxPtr         max_key() { return &upperBound; }
00277 
00278 protected:
00279         Oidx                    upperBound;
00280 };

00293 class AGENTPP_DECL MibStaticEntry: public Vbx {
00294  public:
00295         MibStaticEntry(const Vbx& v): Vbx(v) { }
00296         MibStaticEntry(const Oidx& o, const NS_SNMP SnmpSyntax& v): Vbx(o)
00297           { set_value(v); } 
00298         MibStaticEntry(const MibStaticEntry& other): Vbx(other) { }
00299 
00300         OidxPtr         key() { return (Oidx*)&iv_vb_oid; }
00301 };
